dict.string:
# NOTE: The template parser is designed to remove lines which are considered # documentation blocks or code banners, and any trailing empty line. # # This gives us the ability to control whether or not documenation and banners # are automatically added by the application. Please set the shell variables # TM_ASDOC_GENERATION and TM_AS3_BANNER_GENERATION to any value to have the # parser keep the associated part of the document.
as3_template_parser.rb < class.as
